# Component Name

Brief description of the component and its purpose.

## Props
| Prop | Type | Required | Default | Description |
|------|------|----------|---------|-------------|
| prop1 | type | yes/no | default | description |

## Usage
```tsx
import { ComponentName } from '@healthcare-portal/design-system';

const Example = () => {
  return (
    <ComponentName
      prop1="value"
    />
  );
};
```
